content: pdf digital download crochet pattern crochet bobble tree sweaters make these quick and easy crochet bobble trees for your holiday decor crochet christmas tree sweaters are made to go over foam cones the pdf pattern includes 4 sizes with free video for size small on youtube the pattern is written in standard american terms skill level easy **yarn requirements ** lion brand wool-ease thick & quick shown in fisherman oatmeal kale and grey marble - 80% acrylic 20%wool 170g/106yds buy here https //shrsl com/2f7sx sizes s m l xl finished size 4x7 5x10 5x13 6x19 balls needed 1 1 1 2 yards 35 60 90 150 crochet hook requirements us m/13 9mm or size needed to obtain gauge buy here https //bit ly/3jnjcho additional supplies yarn needle foam cone 2 9x5 8 3 9x8 8 3 9x11 8 4 75x17 9 purchased from michaels special stitches bobble bobble - *yarn over yo insert hook into stitch and pull up a loop yo pull through two repeat from * two more times yo pull through all four loops on the hook gauge 6 sts and 6 row = to 4 in pattern video link https //youtu be/tid8rrs-7pw you re welcome to sell your finished items from this pattern when selling items online i would love you to reference me as the designer you must use your own photos to sell your work all my images are copyright protected and cannot be used to sell your items
